pizza.title: Pizza
pizza.description: Pizza is an Italian dish consisting of a usually round, flattened base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients, which is then baked at a high temperature, traditionally in a wood-fired oven. A small pizza is sometimes called a pizzetta.

biryani.title: Biryani
biryani.description: Biryani is a mixed rice dish. It is made with Indian spices, rice, and meat usually that of chicken, fish, and sometimes, in addition, eggs or vegetables such as potatoes in certain regional varieties.

pasta.title: Pasta
pasta.description: Pasta is a type of food typically made from an unleavened dough of wheat flour mixed with water or eggs, and formed into sheets or other shapes, then cooked by boiling or baking.

chocolateCake.title: Molten chocolate cake
